com.devtence.will.dev.endpoints

Interface AuthenticableController<T extends BaseModel>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UsersAPI

    public interface AuthenticableController<T extends BaseModel>
    Interface for a BaseController Class that handles authentication and must implement the following methods.
    Since:
    2016-06-03
    Author:
    plessmann
    See Also:
    BaseController, BaseModel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthorizationWrapper authenticate(T data, com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
      This method should validate the user and generate a JWT to be used for authenticated operations.
      BooleanWrapper checkUser(T data, com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
      Method to check for the existence of a field to be used as a unique identifier for the entity.
      BooleanWrapper recoverPassword(T data, com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
      Method to start the password recovery process, this mechanic should be defined in a proper way.
      BooleanWrapper updatePassword(T data, com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
      Method to finish the password recovery process, this mechanic should be defined in a proper way.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        AuthorizationWrapper authenticate(T data,
                                com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
                                  throws com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException,
                                         com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException,
                                         com.google.api.server.spi.response.NotFoundException,
                                         com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException
        This method should validate the user and generate a JWT to be used for authenticated operations.
        Parameters:
        data - user and password of the AuthenticableEntity
        user - user that accepts the client being used to for the authentication operation
        Returns:
        an object containing the JWT to be uesed in subsequent operations
        Throws:
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException - the data parameter is missing data needed to authenticate
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException - a generic error occurred that is not related to the input
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.NotFoundException - the username trying to authenticate doesn't exists
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException - the user parameter did not pass the authentication test

      • recoverPassword

        BooleanWrapper recoverPassword(T data,
                             com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
                               throws com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException,
                                      com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException,
                                      com.google.api.server.spi.response.NotFoundException,
                                      com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException
        Method to start the password recovery process, this mechanic should be defined in a proper way.
        Parameters:
        data - data to identify the user starting the process
        user - user that accepts the client being used to for the authentication operation
        Returns:
        a simple flag defining the success of the start of the process
        Throws:
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException - the data parameter is missing data needed to init the process
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException - a generic error ocurred that is not related to the input
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.NotFoundException - the username trying to authenticate doesnt exists
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException - the user parameter did not pass the authentication test

      • updatePassword

        BooleanWrapper updatePassword(T data,
                            com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
                              throws com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException,
                                     com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException,
                                     com.google.api.server.spi.response.NotFoundException,
                                     com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException
        Method to finish the password recovery process, this mechanic should be defined in a proper way.
        Parameters:
        data - data to identify the user starting the process
        user - user that accepts the client being used to for the authentication operation
        Returns:
        a simple flag defining the succes of the finish of the process
        Throws:
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException - the data parameter is missing data needed to complet e the process
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException - a generic error ocurred that is not related to the input
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.NotFoundException - the username trying to authenticate doesnt exists
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException - the user parameter did not pass the authentication test

      • checkUser

        BooleanWrapper checkUser(T data,
                       com.google.api.server.spi.auth.common.User user)
                         throws com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException,
                                com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException,
                                com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException
        Method to check for the existence of a field to be used as a unique identifier for the entity. for example the username.
        Parameters:
        data - element of T containing the field to check
        user - user that accepts the client being used to for the authentication operation
        Returns:
        flag defining the existence of the filed in the persistence unit
        Throws:
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.BadRequestException - the data parameter is missing data to check the uniqueness
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.InternalServerErrorException - a generic error occurred that is not related to the input
        com.google.api.server.spi.response.UnauthorizedException - the user parameter did not pass the authentication test
